Name: Okunis
Description:

Item Type: Mining Gadget

Instability: -40%

Focus power on a deposit's sweet spot with the Okunis. Shubin Interstellar designed this mining accessory to both reduce a deposit's instability and quickly deliver power once reaching the optimal charge window. This exceptional performance most be managed properly as the power spike also significantly increases the overcharge rate.
